team_0115_nelke_02a: Oh, come on. The name’s Clive, remember?[npcn:1E]
team_0115_nelke_03:
Actually...no. It’s time for me to bring this little
performance to an end.[npcn:1E]
team_0115_nelke_04: Allow me to reveal my true identity![npcn:1E]
team_0115_nelke_06: I do apologize for deceiving you with my disguise.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_07a:
In truth, the boy you knew as Clive was none
other than the director of Naranja Academy...[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_07b:
In truth, the boy you knew as Clive was none
other than the director of Uva Academy...[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_09a:
Yes, this must be quite the shock! My disguise
was perfect, after all.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_09b:
What?! But my disguise was perfect!\c
Although, now that I think about it...I did neglect
to keep up my youthful act on a few occasions.\r
That must have been what gave me away.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_10:
Regardless, there is still one more astonishing
truth I must reveal to you.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_11:
The true identity of Cassiopeia, the big boss of
Team Star...was ME all along!!![npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_13:
When you heard Cassiopeia over the phone,
that was actually a prerecorded voice.\c
I pulled it off using, er...you know, one of those...
high-tech gizmos! Oh yes, it was very clever![npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_14:
[BD06:0]So, M[aster;iss:g] [trnm:0]! Now
you\r
know\r
I’m\r
the\r
big\r
boss!\r
That\r
means\r
there\r
is\r
just\r
one\r
thing\r
left\r
to do![npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_15: Face me in one final showdown to decide it all![npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_17:
It seems you have grown quite splendidly over
the course of your Treasure Hunt.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_18: And here, once again, I must apologize—[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_20:
Though Clive and myself being the same person
was no lie, mind you...[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_22:
But I believe I can hazard a guess as to who
they may be.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_23:
That is why I sought to spare you from having to
confront them in battle.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_24: Their sorrows...should not be yours to bear.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_25:
However, Cassiopeia has settled on a course of
action and is determined to see it through.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_26:
I do not imagine any ordinary student could hope
to stand against them and win.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_27: So, I challenged you to a battle to test your skill.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_28:
If you had lost, it would have fallen to me to
bring down Cassiopeia. Such was my resolve.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_29:
But it turns out you are as strong as you are kind.
If anyone has a chance at saving that poor child,\r
it is surely you.[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_30:
As an educator it shames me to burden one of
my students with such a task...[npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_31:
But please...defeat Cassiopeia! Take on the big
boss of Team Star and win![npcn:A]
team_0115_nelke_32:
Thank you, from the bottom of my heart. I leave
this in your hands.[npcn:A]
team_0115_math_01: You there! What do you think you’re doing?![npcn:25]
team_0115_nelke_33: Ah! Ms. Tyme, a pleasure to see you.[npcn:A]
team_0115_math_02: It’s no pleasure at all, Mr. Clavell![npcn:25]
team_0115_math_03:
I come here to investigate reports of an illicit
battle on school grounds, and what do I find?[npcn:25]
team_0115_math_04:
Why, the director of the academy himself!
Facing off against one of our students, no less!\r
What were you thinking?![npcn:25]
team_0115_nelke_34:
Ah, no, if I could just explain. You see, it is a
rather sad tale...[npcn:A]
team_0115_math_05:
Oh, spare me! Your excuses reek worse than a
Stunky’s behind![npcn:25]
team_0115_nelke_37:
Remember—the big boss asked us to meet them
in the schoolyard after dark.[npcn:A]
team_0115_math_06:
You’ll write a letter of apology to the students
and faculty at once!\c
And I’ll be reporting this to the chairwoman of
the school board, make no mistake![npcn:25]
team_0115_nelke_39:
Good gracious, no! A-anything but that,
I implore you...[npcn:A]
